sentences.en: At bottom we knew how intractable the world was.
sentences.cn: 实际上,我们知道这个世界是多么难对付.

sentences.en: Chronic hiccup is an intractable disease and its pathogenesis is still unclear.
sentences.cn: 慢性呃逆是一不易治疗的疾病,其发生机制尚不明确.

sentences.en: Enough methods now exist to solve all but the most intractable cases.
sentences.cn: 现在有足够的办法去解决几乎是最难对待的局面.

sentences.en: Even for him, the cello an 17 intractable instrument, unforgiving of ambition.
sentences.cn: 即使对他来说, 大提琴也是难以驾驭的乐器 —— 它对雄心万丈的人也一样铁面无情.

sentences.en: Even for him, the cello is an intractable instrument, unforgiving of ambition.
sentences.cn: 即使对他来说, 大提琴也是难以驾驭的乐器──它对雄心万丈的人也一样铁面无情.

sentences.en: In 1977, to cover every intractable problem with excuses for complacent resignation.
sentences.cn: 而到了1977年, 其目的在于,以彬彬有礼的顺从为理由口实,来掩盖各种难以驾驭的问题.

sentences.en: It emerged as the most intractable issue of our era.
sentences.cn: 它成了我们时代最难解决的问题.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the cause of intractable suppurative otitis media.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨难治性化脓性中耳炎的原因.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the curative effect of operation for intractable calcaneodynia.
sentences.cn: 目的观察顽固性跟痛症的手术治疗效果.

sentences.en: Still can not let go those recollections, still so intractable!
sentences.cn: 依然放不下那些回忆, 依然那么任性!

sentences.en: Take no notice of such a wild and intractable man.
sentences.cn: 不要理这个桀骜不驯的人.

sentences.en: The economy still faces intractable problems.
sentences.cn: 经济仍然面临着一些棘手的问题。

sentences.en: The most intractable problem of glioma is tumor recurrence after operation.
sentences.cn: 脑胶质瘤治疗中最棘手的问题是术后肿瘤复发.

sentences.en: the seemingly intractable problem of human greed
sentences.cn: 似乎难以解决的人性贪婪问题

sentences.en: What followed was six weeks of intractable back pain.
sentences.cn: 我发现先前所说的那段话[很正确,但却使不上力].

sentences.en: What may be done to reduce the influence of intractable opponents?
sentences.cn: 能做些什么来减少那些难缠的反对者的影响呢？

words.tran_cn: 棘手的；难治的；倔强的；不听话的

trans.tran_cn: 难对付的，难管教的，倔强的，难加工的，难治疗的
trans.tran_en: an intractable problem is very difficult to deal with or solve
